column1: MRI image size (128, 256, 1) illustrating the head of a man of 37 years old in weighting T2, with sagittal section. We observe slice n°125 starting from the right hemisphere of the skull. The observed details include the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 725.0977 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 7214.0625 mm³, the left lateral ventricle of volume 213.5742 mm³, the white matter of left hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 52.7344 mm³, the left cerebellar cortex of volume 1720.4590 mm³, the left thalamus of volume 164.7949 mm³, the third ventricle of volume 104.1504 mm³, the fourth ventricle of volume 89.6484 mm³, the brainstem of volume 1033.5938 mm³, the cerebrospinal fluid of volume 108.1055 mm³, the left ventral diencephalon of volume 225.4395 mm³, the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 35.5957 mm³ and the right cerebellar cortex of volume 22.4121 mm³.
